name: windsurf
title: Windsurf Extension
description: Quick Raycast actions for Windsurf: open files/folders in Windsurf and manage Windsurf projects.
author: vikas-bansal

commands.name: open-with-windsurf
commands.title: Open with Windsurf
commands.description: Select a file or folder to open it in Windsurf IDE

commands.name: windsurf-projects
commands.title: View Windsurf Projects
commands.description: View and manage all folders or files opened using 'Open with Windsurf'

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
